abstrac: I am a passionate 3D Designer and I always aim to fulfill and exceed the expectations of the clients I work with and finish every task with quality and precision
bio: Hello, I am a passionate 3D Blender Artist/Visualizer and I specialize in the creation of 3D models, interiors/exteriors, as well as characters and creatures. I am always focused on creating models and designs that capture every detail and I always tend to finish my work in high quality. I am a person who is willing to learn new skills whenever I get the chance to. I was working as a full-time 3D Artist at a reputable studio. Our work was mainly focused on experience design, my job was to create 3D characters, interior and exterior visualizations, and much more things. Our work had a wide range. Now I work with the studio as a freelancer whenever they need me. Aside from work, my hobbies are mainly drawing, music, watching tv shows, watching things related to work like real estate, renovation, and so on and so forth. I also like reading books related to my work because reading as a form of learning is one of the best methods of learning for me. Of course, my main method of learning would be watching, and watching, and watching. I'm quite an introvert person too.

I would say because of my job, I would mainly focus my freelance opportunities on Friday and Saturday as I have all day to work on those two days, I would prefer bank transfer as my main method of payment, however; PayPal could be an option as well. I usually prefer clients contacting me through Whatsapp or a dedicated messaging service if the website has one.

abstrac: A seasoned writer, graphics designer, and illustrator. (Author of the book Voice of the Mother Drum).
bio:
Hi,
 
My name is Innocent. I hold a Bachelors degree in Religion and Human relations but I have been working professionally for the past 5 years as a freelance writer. I was immediately drawn to your project because I am skilled in writing in different niches. I have completed a countless number of articles on different subjects particularly on SEO and the use of keywords. The most invaluable skill I have learned over the years is the ability to blend into different writing styles and the ability to produce reader-friendly informative articles in the shortest possible time. Some of the qualities of my articles are;
High readability score
Reader-friendly
Highly researched and informative (No fluff)
Pass Copyscape premium (No plagiarism)
Properly proofread for spellings and grammar.
If given the opportunity to work on this project I promise to bring my wealth of experience to ensure the successful completion of this project. I also want to use this opportunity to let you know that I am open to long-term engagement. I have attached samples of previous projects I have completed for your review as well as to give you a glimpse of my writing style.
I understand the importance of effective communication to the successful completion of any project that is why I look forward to discussing further on this project through my inbox.
 Best regards.
10 hours per day, every day of the week excluding Sundays.
